title: PHYS 405 Radiation Biophysics
description: Physical and chemical interactions of ionizing radiations and their biological effects at the cellular, tissue and whole-animal levels. Credit will be given for only one of PHYS 405, 536. See the Faculty of Science Credit Exclusion Lists: www.calendar.ubc.ca/vancouver/index.cfm?tree=12,215,410,414.
prerequisites: One of PHYS 102, PHYS 108, PHYS 153, SCIE 001. (and third year standing in Science or Applied Science.)
